mapper.select: select REVIEW_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, REVIEW_WRITER, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_REGDATE, REVIEW_STAR, GOODS_NUM, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DELETE from (select rownum rn, R.REVIEW_NUM, R.REVIEW_TITLE, R.REVIEW_REGDATE, R.MEMBER_NUM, R.REVIEW_STAR, R.REVIEW_WRITER, R.REVIEW_DELETE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, G.GOODS_NUM FROM REVIEW_TBL R inner join GOODS_TBL G on R.GOODS_NUM = G.GOODS_NUM WHERE rownum <=#{pageNum} * #{amount} AND G.GOODS_NUM =#{goodsNum} AND R.REVIEW_DELETE = 'N') where rn>(#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} ORDER BY REVIEW_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: insert into REVIEW_TBL (REVIEW_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, REVIEW_WRITER, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, GOODS_NUM, ORDER_NUM, REVIEW_STAR) values (REVIEW_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{memberNum}, #{reviewWriter}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{goodsNum}, #{orderNum}, #{reviewStar})
mapper.update: update REVIEW_TBL set REVIEW_TITLE = #{reviewTitle}, REVIEW_CONTENT = #{reviewContent}, where REVIEW_NUM = #{reviewNum}
